      Parser date string into java.util.Date This method use to generate the reference portlet data search SQL statement, if the field type is HTML_TEXTBOX_OF_DATE, we need parse the field value date string to a date object with current agency date pattern setting, then parse the date object format to "MM/dd/yyyy" and use it as the SQL parameter.

        Parameters:

        Throws:

        public java.lang.String addDate(java.lang.String startDate,
                       long addDays)
                         throws com.accela.aa.exception.AAException
        Add or subtract date for some days
        Parameters:
        startDate - The date to be added. Date format MM/DD/YYYY, for example 04/29/2008
        addDays - How many days to be added
        Returns:
        Added date
        Throws:
        com.accela.aa.exception.AAException

      • diffDate

        public long diffDate(java.lang.String startDate,
            java.lang.String endDate)
              throws com.accela.aa.exception.AAException
        Calculate how many days data1 before data2
        Parameters:
        startDate - - Date formate MM/DD/YYYY, for example: 04/29/2008
        endDate - - Date formate MM/DD/YYYY, for example: 04/29/2008
        Returns:
        date1 - date2
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Check the date string whether is valid date format or not according current language date pattern, if it's not a valid date format, throw a exception.

      • formatDate

        public java.lang.String formatDate(java.lang.String dateString,
                          java.lang.String pattern)
                            throws java.text.ParseException
        Parser date string into given formatted string This method use to convert inputed date string to given formatted string. It is originally used for bug33067 so that it can be used to compare dates in JavaScript
        Parameters:
        dateString -
        pattern - format string. It is yyyy/MM/dd for bug 33067
        Returns:
        formatted string
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • parseDate

        public java.lang.String parseDate(java.lang.String dateString)
                           throws java.text.ParseException
        Parser date string into java.util.Date This method use to generate the reference portlet data search SQL statement, if the field type is HTML_TEXTBOX_OF_DATE, we need parse the field value date string to a date object with current agency date pattern setting, then parse the date object format to "MM/dd/yyyy" and use it as the SQL parameter. Because all I18N language date infomation save to pattern "MM/dd/yyyy".
        Parameters:
        dateString -
        Returns:
        String of entered date
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • getCurrentDatePattern

        public java.lang.String getCurrentDatePattern()
        Get current agency date format pattern according the I18N setting
        Returns:
        Current Date Pattern
